segments.text: Yeah , but you guys don't stay with the same classmates all day , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . The people in your math class might not be the people you have science with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , you sent out invitations to your whole graduating class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . And the date is set for homecoming night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought homecoming was a high school dance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a football game the school team plays at home . The dance and reunions are usually that night , too .
segments.speaker: S2
